name: Minaal Carry-on 2.0
pros: Designed specifically for one-bag travel and digital nomads.
Sleek, professional aesthetic suitable for various environments.
Excellent build quality and durable materials.
Thoughtful organization for tech and travel essentials.
cons: Can feel structured/boxy even when not full.
Minimalist exterior lacks extensive quick-access pockets.
Hip belt often sold separately or less substantial.
